name: Jungzzle
description:
Controls : Using the arrow keys or the mouse. You can swipe a line to move it. 

Jungzzle is a musical puzzle game. Any bamboo that you struck create a sound. And when you complete a melody the path end up linking together all the bamboos by the music they made just for you. What's better than music to represent a link between us! (Weirdly enough, the game was made alone)

Move bamboos to guide the balls to one of the two circles. Each melody played 3 times remove all the bamboos that you stroke. If a line doesn't have bamboo anymore, it's replaced. The more stuff you do in one melody, the higher the combo bonus will be!

If you encounter any issue with the web version, please use the download.
